E.label: Excellent
E.description: Awarded by ACECQA to services that demonstrate excellence in practice, community leadership, and commitment to continuous quality improvement, exceeding the National Quality Standard.

X.label: Exceeding NQS
X.description: The service is exceeding the National Quality Standard in all seven Quality Areas, showing a level of practice above and beyond the requirements.

M.label: Meeting NQS
M.description: The service meets all seven Quality Areas of the National Quality Standard and the requirements of the National Regulations.

W.label: Working Towards NQS
W.description: The service is meeting at least four of the seven Quality Areas of the National Quality Standard and is required to take action to address the remaining areas.

S.label: Significant Improvement Required
S.description: The service has failed to meet the National Quality Standard and is subject to compliance action by the Regulatory Authority.

N.label: Not Assessed
N.description: The service approval has been granted but the service has not yet been assessed against the National Quality Standard.

P.label: Provisional
P.description: A temporary rating that may be given if the service has been assessed but the rating outcome is pending or under review.

R.label: Rating Revoked
R.description: The service's rating has been revoked by the Regulatory Authority, often due to significant regulatory or operational failures.

U.label: Suspended
U.description: The service's operations or rating process is suspended by the Regulatory Authority.

A.label: N/A or Missing Data
A.description: No applicable rating exists for this field, or the data was missing/null in the source file.

qa1.label: Educational Program and Practice
qa1.description: The educational program supports all children's learning and development, is based on an approved learning framework, and is planned and implemented in ways that ensure children achieve learning outcomes.

qa2.label: Children's Health and Safety
qa2.description: Children's health and safety are promoted, and they are protected from illness and hazard.

qa3.label: Physical Environment
qa3.description: The physical environment is safe, suitable, and provides a rich and diverse range of experiences that promote children’s learning and development.

qa4.label: Staffing Arrangements
qa4.description: Qualified and experienced educators, who develop warm, respectful relationships with children, create predictable environments and encourage children’s active engagement in the learning program.

qa5.label: Relationships with Children
qa5.description: Relationships with children are responsive, respectful, and promote children’s sense of belonging.

qa6.label: Collaborative Partnerships with Families and Communities
qa6.description: Collaborative partnerships with families and communities are formed to ensure continuity of learning and to support children’s inclusion and participation in the community.

qa7.label: Governance and Leadership
qa7.description: Effective leadership and governance of the service contribute to the ongoing improvement of quality outcomes for children.
